text: Jenna Jameson (born Jenna Marie Massoli on April 9, 1974) is a former American porn star. She grew up in Montana. She started making pornographic movies in 1993. Within three years, she had won the three awards in the adult movie industry. She has since won more than 20 adult movie awards, and has been inducted into both the X-Rated Critics Organization and Adult Video News Halls of Fame. In 2004, she wrote an autobiography, How to Make Love Like a Porn Star: A Cautionary Tale. The book was at the top of the New York Times Best Seller list for six weeks. Born a Roman Catholic she officially converted to Orthodox Judaism in 2016, so she could marry her Israeli boyfriend. On January 12, 2022, Jameson announced that she was suffering from Guillain–Barré syndrome. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Las Vegas Category:Actors from Montana Category:American adult models Category:American autobiographers Category:American crime victims Category:American movie actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American pornographic actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Bisexual Jews Category:Businesspeople from Las Vegas Category:Businesspeople from Montana Category:Converts to Judaism Category:Former Christians Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American writers Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish models Category:Jewish sex industry people Category:Models from Nevada Category:Writers from Montana Category:Writers from Nevada Category:AVN Award winners
title: Jenna Jameson
